pages.text: Peat-Fired engines use peat as fuel (or the upgraded version of peat, Bituminous peat) and produce Ash as a by-product.
Peat burns for 5000 ticks and produces 10 RF every tick, 1 peat makes 0.66 Ash, so you get 2 Ash for burning 3 peat.$(br2)Bituminous Peat burns for 6000 ticks and produces 20 RF/tick.
